price: Conocían a su Mensajero [Mujámmad], pero igualmente lo rechazaron.
arabic: أَمۡ لَمۡ يَعۡرِفُواْ رَسُولَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: am lam yaʿrifū rasūlahum fahum lahu munkirūna
